channel.title: Where do i put code for going up and down stairs?

item.title: Where do i put code for going up and down stairs?
item.dc:creator: @wtfnub wtfnub
item.description:
@wtfnub wrote:

i hav this code…
private void climb(int x, int y, int height, String message) { //or public it doesn’t matter
teleportToX = x;
teleportToY = y;
heightLevel = height;
if(message != null && message != “”) {
sendMessage(message);
}
}
but where do i put it??

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i put code for going up and down stairs?
